cause.description:
Let's work together to win in our great state!
1. Barack Obama is the best candidate for president
2. We need to get our troops out of the civil war in Iraq
3. Every American deserves health care
4. Every American deserves the possibility to a college education
5. More fuel- efficient vehicles are needed to compete with the auto manufacturers overseas
6. The genocide in Darfur needs to be stopped
7. America needs to regain its acclaimed position in the global community
cause.mission: is to help Senator Obama win in Michigan on his way to becoming president
cause.name: Barack Obama wins Michigan... and then the White House!
